channel.title: Consumer Reports on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Consumer Reports on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Consumer Conflict
item.description: Today in Tedium: Last year, a consumer advocate showed up in the most unlikely place: On YouTube, the home of the no-questions-asked unboxing channel. Cody Crouch, aka iTwe4kz, reviewed a set of earbuds from a company called Kanoa. In a Nike hat and a Puma sleeveless shirt, Crouch (who was clearly frustrated) trashed the earbuds at length and questioned the behavior of the company that was banking on him to give a good review.
